thread.title: When It Comes to Vladimir Putin, Donald Trump and His GOP Foes Divide
thread.title_full: When It Comes to Vladimir Putin, Donald Trump and His GOP Foes Divide - WSJ

author: Gerald F. Seib
title: When It Comes to Vladimir Putin, Donald Trump and His GOP Foes Divide
text:
Almost unnoticed, a seminal debate is emerging in the Republican presidential primary on one of the most important topics on the planet.
The issue is what to do about the increasingly assertive Russian President Vladimir Putin. Most GOP presidential contenders fume about Russiaâ€™s new military incursion in Syria and talk of confronting Mr. Putin there before it goes further. They also call for increasing the military pressure on...
